ygData.subject: Enter Energonians

Subject: Enter Energonians
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       The Orb shot through the Transwarp tunnle as fast as its warp 
cababilities would permit. As it went, the tunnle collapsed on itself, a 
result from the vast amounts of Energon coming from within the Orb.
      The other end opened to a spectacular view of Prehistoric Earth, and 
its single moon. It looked peaceful enough, but the pilots of the Orb knew 
better. They knew a war was raging on the surface.
      Finally, the Orb broke free of the tunnle, and it slammed shut behinde 
it with a beautiful brilliance of multicolor. After the orb adjusted itself, 
it took orbit around the planet.
      Ominous Prime looked over his four Energonians. He had created them. 
They were the only other members of his species. A species he was intent on 
making grow. 
      "Putnam, Venus, Odiphious, Akron, we have arrived here. Not by choice, 
but nun-the-less we will make the best of it. This planet once had veins of 
Energon coarsing through it, and Im sure we can still mine it for more." He 
said, gesturing to the main viewer and a picture of the blue and green planet 
earth. It displayed different types of animals, plants, minerals, and such. 
Also it displayed the information Ominous Prime recalled about the factions 
of Transformers that resided there, whic wasnt much to go on from all the 
change that had occured.
      "Sir, if I must say, I think this would be an exceptional spot to 
settle. According to the map, its an island covered in a thick jungle and has 
several volcanos. I believe we can set the Orb down at the base of this 
volcano," Putnam, the Subcommander said, "It provides a virtual wall of 
protection, not to mention its absolutely loaded with minerals. The jungle is 
dense and would prove difficult for ground troop invasion." He said, in 
ending and looked to the others.
      Ominous looked down at the metallic, blue eyes Subcommander, "Excellent 
thinking. Set a course for it. Venus, raise shileds and the cloaking device. 
Odiphious, arm cannons and pilot the Navsystem." 
      The Energonians dispersed to thier own little computer stations. After 
a brief pause the Orb began the bumpy descent into the jungles of Madagascar. 
The Orb settled nicely at the base of the Volcano, and around it grew tall, 
green, trees and shrubs.
      Ominous opened the hatch, and the four others followed him out into the 
open air. This was the first time they had ever stepped foot on an actual 
planet. "Start the mining mechanism now. Switch from Main Power to solar. And 
I want long range scans on around the clock. Even with our cloak, I expect 
vistors sooner or later."

--part1_77.da763bd.276e4a64_boundary
